description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for dental implants businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the dental implants industry.

Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Dental Implants businesses wanting to automate operations
New dental implants businesses needing a complete system
Established healthcare & medical companies looking to scale
